thread.title: Facebook photos allegedly show China tourists stripping on Sabahs Sibuan Island
thread.title_full: Facebook photos allegedly show China tourists stripping on Sabahs Sibuan Island

title: Facebook photos allegedly show China tourists stripping on Sabahs Sibuan Island
text:
Facebook photos allegedly show China tourists stripping on Sabah's Sibuan Island 
Asia News Network Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Another act of stripping by tourists has been uncovered in Sabah, this time involving China nationals. 
The incident is believed to have taken place at Sibuan, one of the many islands off Semporna. 
Semporna police were alerted following a tip-off from a Semporna resident on Tuesday who saw four photographs uploaded on Facebook of the tourists in the nude. The Facebook posts have since gone viral. 
One of the photos showed three topless women photographed from behind, with another showing seven nude men photographed from behind and a woman in a bra and shorts posing towards the camera...
